Pre-Game Insights: Cavaliers are 25-9-0 against the spread this season.
Hornets are 15-16-2 against the spread this year.
Cavaliers games have finished with a final combined score above the over/under 22 times out of 33 chances this season.
Hornets games this year have hit the over on 12 of 33 set point totals (36.4%).
Cleveland has covered the spread in a higher percentage of its home games than away games.
Cavaliers hit the over more often at home, as they've gone over the total 12 times in 18 opportunities this season (66.7%). In away games, they have hit the over 10 times in 16 opportunities (62.5%).
Against the spread, Charlotte has had better results away (8-7-0) than at home (7-9-2).
